sentences.en: At that time, 49 % Wahaha, Danone and Peregrine, together accounting for 51 %.
sentences.cn: 当时,娃哈哈持股49%, 达能与百富勤合占51%.

sentences.en: By Li Ning Olympic Dongfeng, 70 billion net worth came in the first Peregrine 76.
sentences.cn: 李宁借奥运东风, 以70亿元的身家排在百富榜第76位.

sentences.en: Can I escape from hawk and peregrine when they are after?
sentences.cn: 如果我被老鹰或隼之类的盯上了,能逃脱掉 么 ?

sentences.en: Fringe benefits here include a cigar club, the fastest lifts in the world, and the chance to snap peregrine falcons as they migrate past your no doubt hermetically sealed expanse of window.
sentences.cn: 这里的额外好处包括了一个雪茄俱乐部，世界上最快速的电梯，以及当游隼迁徙飞过你的绝对密封的巨大玻璃窗户时，抓住它们的机会。

sentences.en: I also have a feather from another species making a comeback against the odds, the peregrine falcon.
sentences.cn: 我还有一支游隼羽毛，这是另一个被挽救的生物种类。

sentences.en: One of Scotland’s best ridge walks is a favourite of Nutkins: it offers a chance to see golden eagles, peregrine falcons and ravens, as well as glorious wild and mountainous countryside.
sentences.cn: 在这苏格兰山岭散步的最佳之地是努特金的爱好之一: 在这里，有机会看到金雕，游隼及乌鸦，还有美丽的大自然以及山区农村的风情。

sentences.en: Peregrine falcons usually pluck the feathers and strip the flesh off their bird prey.
sentences.cn: 游隼捕到鸟类猎物时,通常是先拔掉它们的羽毛,再把肉撕下来.

sentences.en: The first thing people think of when they hear the word " peregrine " is a falcon.
sentences.cn: 人们听到 “ 远游客 ” 这个词首先联想起的是游鹰.

sentences.en: The vagaries of the capital market in Peregrine's annual list once again demonstrated.
sentences.cn: 资本市场的变幻莫测在一年一度的百富榜上再次展现.

sentences.en: This image of a swirling flock of starlings evading a peregrine falcon in Rome, Italy.
sentences.cn: 这张照片描绘了在意大利首都罗马的天空上演的一场追逐战, 一大群八哥正在躲避一只游隼的追逐.

sentences.en: Was he finally free from the fear of hawk peregrine?
sentences.cn: 于是,这样他就能从鹰隼的恐惧阴影中解放出来了 吗 ?
